xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/60588-Bodo Wartke - König Ödipus 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9HUuAFiLTH04vOprqirUyzwHe8s.jpg With only nine props and rapid role changes, Bodo Wartke tells the story of Oedipus, King of Thebes, who unknowingly kills his own father. And later, as a reward for liberating Thebes from the Sphinx, Jocasta, the king's widow and thus his own mother, is given in marriage. Bodo Wartke - König Ödipus
